yes_no: Is the house greyhound proof? (i.e. no sharp edges, breakable items, books, pictures, etc. in dog's reach). If N provide details.

home_type.question: What style of home will the greyhound enter?

flooring.question: What type of flooring does the house have?

crating.question: If needed, is the family willing to crate the dog

rubbish.question: Where is the trash kept? Is the family willing to move the trash if suggested?

other_pets.question: Are there other pets in the house? If so what kind?

options: In sight but out of reach
In sight and in reach. Willing to move them.

Where will the dog be fed and watered?
